姞字的基本解释

姞
jí
姓。

姞字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jí］
［《廣韻》巨乙切，入質，羣。］
(1)谨慎。
(2)姓。旧传黄帝之后得姓者十四人，为十二姓，其一为姞。见《国语·晋语四》。

姞字的康熙字典解释

【丑集下】【女字部】　姞； 康熙笔画：9； 页码：页259第22
【廣韻】巨乙切【集韻】【韻會】極乙切，?音佶。姓也。又字。【詩·大雅】爲韓姞相攸，莫如韓樂。【左傳·宣三年】鄭文公賤妾曰燕姞，夢天使與已蘭，曰：余爲伯儵，余而祖也。石癸曰：吾聞姞吉人，后稷之元妃也。【註】燕姞，南燕姓。【晉語】黃帝之子，得姓者十四人，姞，其一也。【鐘鼎文】作?。或作吉〈土吉〉郅。

姞字的起名意思

意指谨慎。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jí］
["Guangyun" Ju Yi cut, enter the quality, group. ]
(1) Be cautious.
(2) Last name. According to the old legend, 14 people were given surnames after the Yellow Emperor, with twelve surnames, one of whom was Xi. See "Mandarin · Jin Language Four".

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chou Ji 2] [Female Character Department] 　姞; Kangxi Strokes: 9; Page Number: Page 259 22
[Guang Yun] Ju Yi Cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Ji Yi Cut,? Yin Ji. Last name also. Another word. 【Poetry·Daya】For Han Yu, it is better than Han Le. [Zuo Zhuan·Xuan Three Years] Zheng Wengong's concubine said Yan Xian, dream angel and Jilan, said: Yu is uncle, Yu and ancestor. Shi Gui said: I have heard of Ji Ji people, and also the concubine Yuan of Hou Ji. [Note] Yan Xian, Nan Yan's surname. [Jin dialect] The son of the Yellow Emperor, 14 people have the surname, Xiong, one of them. [Zhong Dingwen] Created?. Or Zuo Ji (Tu Ji) Zhi.
